newsitem.title: KAZAKHSTAN: Kazakhstan Feb unemployment rises to 4.4 pct.
newsitem.headline: Kazakhstan Feb unemployment rises to 4.4 pct.

text.p: Kazakhstan's official unemployment total at the end of February rose to 0.30 million, or 4.4 percent of the workforce, from 0.29 million in January, the National Statistics Committee said on Wednesday.
It gave the following data for Kazakhstan unemployment --
Note - Figures for calculating total unemployed are based on the methodology of the International Labour Organisation.
